'''Simple Vault Key II''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained from a [[chest]] atop a ship in the eastern part of [[Erinnyes Forest]].

It is used with [[Simple Vault Key I]] and [[Simple Vault Key III]] to open the vault inside the shipwreck containing a [[Hydroculus]] and a Precious Chest with a [[Foggy Forest Branch]].
